instructions: On the Home screen, tap the camera icon to open the Camera app. Switch to Selfie Photo mode. See Choosing a capture mode for details. Tap Selfie make up mode is on indicator to display the Beauty Mode options. Note: If the Beauty Mode Face slimming button and Beauty Mode Eye adjustment button options are disabled, you need to turn Bokeh mode off to use these options. Tap each option, and then drag its slider to make your adjustments. Screen showing Beauty Mode options. When ready, tap Camera shutter button . Or simply squeeze the lower sides of your phone.
